name: sy-daily
description: A bot that collects news about Syria from a curated list of sources and posts daily summaries to Telegram

scripts.sam:invoke:collect: npm run build && sam build && dotenv -e .env -- sam local invoke CollectAndSummarizeFunction
scripts.sam:invoke:collect:event: dotenv -e .env -- sam local invoke CollectAndSummarizeFunction -e events/schedule-event.json
scripts.sam:invoke:post:english: npm run build && sam build && dotenv -e .env -- sam local invoke PostToTelegramEnglishFunction -e events/s3-event.json
scripts.sam:invoke:post:arabic: npm run build && sam build && dotenv -e .env -- sam local invoke PostToTelegramArabicFunction -e events/s3-event.json
scripts.sam:dev: npm run build && sam build && sam local start-lambda
